turkish_example_sentence: Sen asla o tehlikeli spor aktivitesini yapmayacaktın çünkü korktun.
english_example_sentence: You were not going to do that dangerous sports activity because you were afraid.
russian_example_sentence: Ты не собирался делать это опасное спортивное занятие, потому что ты боялся.
